entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mont-Tremblant
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:19 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
